setOptions 
 public void setOptions(String options[]) throws Exception
Parses a given list of options. Valid options are:

-A <0-100>
Acuity.

-C <0-100>
Cutoff.

Parameters:
options - the list of options as an array of strings
Throws: Exception
if an option is not supported
